NRCB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Office Assistant Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 07, 2025, 11:45 IST
 National Research Center for Banana
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 07-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 15,000 to 15,000




FOLLOW

National Research Centre for Banana (NRCB) announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Office Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the NRCB Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Tamil Nadu.

NRCB Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Office Assistant 	01	B.Sc

Age Limit for the NRCB Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the NRCB Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the NRCB Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 15,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the NRCB Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NRCB Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Office Assistant Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Then, send the application form along with the relevant documents to the email address given below.

Email Address

nrcbrecruitment@gmail.com

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	31-07-2025
Last Date of Application	16-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
